description:
"Baby's First" reminds you of key events to watch for in your new baby's life, and gives you a place to record the details. You can use the notes to tell the stories, or transfer them to your photo album or paper diary. 

This is my first app, and I decided to build something that my wife in particular would love to have had when our kids were a bit smaller. Feedback is welcome at: bigstoryapps@gmail.com
